thread.title: ‘Meteor Shower’ Show Canceled With Amy Schumer, Laura Benanti Out Sick

author: Charles Passy
title: ‘Meteor Shower’ Show Canceled With Amy Schumer, Laura Benanti Out Sick
text:
“Meteor Shower” went dark last weekend.
Steve Martin’s new Broadway comedy canceled its Sunday matinee because its two female stars, Amy Schumer and Laura Benanti, were both felled by “winter weather illnesses,” according to a press statement.
The cancellation affected the bottom line: The show grossed $709,510 this past week over seven performances,...
